text: Dorysthenes zivettaThomson J (1877) Typi cerambycidarum musei Thomsoniani. Revue et Magasin de Zoologie, Paris. (3) 5 (40): 249-279. is an Asian species of longhorn beetles in the subfamily Prioninae. Records of occurrence are from India, Nepal and China; the infra-species Dorysthenes zivetta laosensis Gressitt & Rondon, 1970 occurs in Indo-China. == References == == External Links == * * Category:Prioninae Category:Insects of Asia
title: Dorysthenes zivetta
